                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        115.03,
                                        96.11,
                                        124.18,
                                        99.16
                                    ],
                                    "text": ")"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        171.83,
                                        78.36,
                                        192.92,
                                        85.8
                                    ],
                                    "text": "α-ACP"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        171.83,
                                        91.58,
                                        185.77,
                                        98.9
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ACP"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        327.12,
                                        143.79,
                                        337.18,
                                        151.84
                                    ],
                                    "text": "0.0"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        327.12,
                                        123.61,
                                        337.18,
                                        131.67
                                    ],
                                    "text": "0.1"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        327.12,
                                        103.43,
                                        337.18,
                                        111.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "1.0"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        323.09,
                                        83.26,
                                        337.18,
                                        91.31
                                    ],
                                    "text": "10.0"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        350.84,
                                        154.43,
                                        354.87,
                                        162.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "8"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        367.39,
                                        154.43,
                                        375.45,
                                        162.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "16"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        385.97,
                                        154.43,
                                        394.02,
                                        162.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "32"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        404.53,
                                        154.43,
                                        412.58,
                                        162.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "64"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        421.08,
                                        154.43,
                                        433.16,
                                        162.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "128"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        439.66,
                                        154.43,
                                        451.73,
                                        162.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "256"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        458.22,
                                        154.43,
                                        490.88,
                                        162.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "512 1024"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        415.46,
                                        164.13,
                                        420.22,
                                        173.28
                                    ],
                                    "text": "d"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        311.72,
                                        111.44,
                                        320.87,
                                        116.61
                                    ],
                                    "text": "β"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        365.79,
                                        81.42,
                                        378.81,
                                        88.73
                                    ],
                                    "text": "0.01"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        402.09,
                                        81.42,
                                        415.1,
                                        88.73
                                    ],
                                    "text": "0.05"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        438.39,
                                        81.42,
                                        447.75,
                                        88.73
                                    ],
                                    "text": "0.1"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        471.04,
                                        81.42,
                                        484.05,
                                        88.73
                                    ],
                                    "text": "0.15"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        183.77,
                                        504.67,
                                        194.01
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Figure 5: Average query times of lifted variable elimination on the output of ACP and α-ACP (left)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        194.68,
                                        496.1,
                                        204.81
                                    ],
                                    "text": "and the average number β of queries after which the offline overhead of α-ACP amortises (right)."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        237.81,
                                        113.98,
                                        249.77
                                    ],
                                    "text": "4"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        125.93,
                                        237.81,
                                        191.02,
                                        249.77
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Experiments"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.69,
                                        261.39,
                                        505.65,
                                        271.45
                                    ],
                                    "text": "To assess the effectiveness of Alg. 1 in practice, we compare the run times of running lifted vari-"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        272.29,
                                        505.65,
                                        282.36
                                    ],
                                    "text": "able elimination on the output of ACP in its original form and of running lifted variable elimina-"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        281.96,
                                        504.02,
                                        293.41
                                    ],
                                    "text": "tion on the output of ACP extended by running Alg. 1 to detect exchangeable factors (α-ACP).1"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        294.11,
                                        505.0,
                                        307.34
                                    ],
                                    "text": "For our experiments, we generate FGs containing between 2d + 1 and d · ⌊log2(d)⌋+ 2d + 1"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        305.02,
                                        503.99,
                                        318.25
                                    ],
                                    "text": "randvars as well as between 2d and d · ⌊log2(d)⌋+ d + 1 factors, where the parameter d ∈"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        315.93,
                                        504.0,
                                        329.16
                                    ],
                                    "text": "{2, 4, 8, 16, 32, 64, 128, 256, 512, 1024} controls the size of the FG. In every FG, a proportion"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        326.94,
                                        504.35,
                                        340.07
                                    ],
                                    "text": "of p ∈{0.01, 0.05, 0.1, 0.15} of the factors is scaled by a scalar α ∈{1, . . . , 10} (chosen uniformly"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        337.75,
                                        504.0,
                                        347.95
                                    ],
                                    "text": "at random). For each choice of d, we pose three to four queries to each FG and report the average"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        348.66,
                                        504.0,
                                        358.72
                                    ],
                                    "text": "run time over all queries. Figure 5 displays the results. The left plot shows the average run times"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        359.57,
                                        504.0,
                                        369.77
                                    ],
                                    "text": "of lifted variable elimination on the output of ACP and α-ACP, respectively. As expected, lifted"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.75,
                                        370.55,
                                        504.0,
                                        380.68
                                    ],
                                    "text": "variable elimination runs significantly faster and is able to handle larger values of d if α-ACP instead"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        381.44,
                                        504.0,
                                        391.59
                                    ],
                                    "text": "of ACP is applied. Since α-ACP is able to detect exchangeable factors that are scaled differently, it"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        392.29,
                                        504.17,
                                        402.36
                                    ],
                                    "text": "detects strictly more symmetries than ACP resulting in a more compact model and hence in faster"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        403.2,
                                        504.0,
                                        413.41
                                    ],
                                    "text": "inference times. Clearly, the speedup depends on the proportion p of scaled factors and thus, we"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        414.19,
                                        450.86,
                                        424.32
                                    ],
                                    "text": "provide additional experimental results for each individual choice of p in Appendix E."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.69,
                                        430.65,
                                        504.0,
                                        440.71
                                    ],
                                    "text": "The boxplot on the right in Fig. 5 displays the average number β of queries after which the additional"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        437.79,
                                        505.25,
                                        453.11
                                    ],
                                    "text": "offline overhead of α-ACP compared to ACP amortises.2 In particular, it holds that β = ∆o / ∆g,"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.64,
                                        452.39,
                                        504.0,
                                        463.83
                                    ],
                                    "text": "where ∆o denotes the offline overhead of α-ACP (i.e., the difference of the offline run times required"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        463.23,
                                        504.35,
                                        474.78
                                    ],
                                    "text": "by α-ACP and ACP) and ∆g denotes the online gain (i.e., the difference of the times required by"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        474.14,
                                        505.25,
                                        484.34
                                    ],
                                    "text": "lifted variable elimination run on the output of ACP and α-ACP). In other words, after β queries,"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        485.05,
                                        505.74,
                                        495.25
                                    ],
                                    "text": "the additional time needed by α-ACP to construct the PFG is saved due to faster inference times."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        496.09,
                                        504.0,
                                        506.16
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Negative values for β are not displayed (hence the missing boxes for some p) as there is no overhead"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        506.86,
                                        504.17,
                                        520.09
                                    ],
                                    "text": "in these cases. The boxplot shows a box for each choice of p for every d ≥8 and it becomes clear"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        517.93,
                                        504.0,
                                        527.98
                                    ],
                                    "text": "that the median value for β is always smaller than one. Apart from a single outlier, all values of β are"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        528.68,
                                        504.0,
                                        538.89
                                    ],
                                    "text": "smaller than ten. Thus, after a maximum of ten queries, the additional offline overhead of α-ACP"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        539.67,
                                        448.22,
                                        549.8
                                    ],
                                    "text": "amortises, showing that α-ACP works efficiently as it introduces almost no overhead."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        578.04,
                                        113.98,
                                        589.99
                                    ],
                                    "text": "5"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        125.93,
                                        578.04,
                                        183.07,
                                        589.99
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Conclusion"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        601.61,
                                        504.0,
                                        611.67
                                    ],
                                    "text": "In this paper, we generalise the ACP algorithm to detect exchangeable factors independent of the"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        612.67,
                                        504.0,
                                        622.53
                                    ],
                                    "text": "scale of their potentials without the requirement of normalising the potentials. Our proposed approach"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        623.52,
                                        504.34,
                                        633.46
                                    ],
                                    "text": "allows for arbitrary scalars and makes use of vector representations in combination with collinearity"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        634.33,
                                        504.17,
                                        644.4
                                    ],
                                    "text": "checks to efficiently detect exchangeable factors independent of their scale. We show that our"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        645.35,
                                        504.0,
                                        655.27
                                    ],
                                    "text": "approach maintains equivalent semantics and at the same time yields a more compact representation"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        656.23,
                                        505.75,
                                        666.19
                                    ],
                                    "text": "by detecting strictly more symmetries than the original ACP algorithm, thereby speeding up inference."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        120.65,
                                        690.79,
                                        504.0,
                                        701.26
                                    ],
                                    "text": "1Note that the run time required to perform probabilistic inference on a model directly depends on the graph"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        702.27,
                                        488.17,
                                        711.24
                                    ],
                                    "text": "size of the model, i.e., the presented run times also give information about the compactness of the models."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        120.65,
                                        711.61,
                                        349.51,
                                        722.09
                                    ],
                                    "text": "2The dots in the boxplot on the right in Fig. 5 represent outliers."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        303.76,
                                        743.01,
                                        308.24,
                                        751.98
                                    ],
                                    "text": "9"
                                }

                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [

                                    ],
                                    "text": "A"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        128.59,
                                        73.14,
                                        321.85,
                                        85.1
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Probabilistic Inference in More Detail"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.69,
                                        92.87,
                                        504.0,
                                        102.91
                                    ],
                                    "text": "The task of probabilistic inference describes the computation of marginal distributions of randvars"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        103.84,
                                        505.66,
                                        113.8
                                    ],
                                    "text": "given observations for other randvars. In other words, probabilistic inference refers to query answer-"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        114.75,
                                        268.51,
                                        124.71
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ing, where a query is defined as follows."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        127.73,
                                        504.0,
                                        141.03
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Definition 6 (Query). A query P(Q | E1 = e1, . . . , Ek = ek) consists of a query term Q and a"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        138.62,
                                        504.0,
                                        152.98
                                    ],
                                    "text": "set of events {Ej = ej}kj=1 (called evidence), where Q and E1, . . . , Ek are randvars. To query a"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        150.66,
                                        467.29,
                                        160.86
                                    ],
                                    "text": "specific probability instead of a probability distribution, the query term is an event Q = q."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        163.79,
                                        504.0,
                                        174.09
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Example 9 (Probabilistic Inference). Take a look again at the FG depicted in Fig. 2a and assume we"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        174.7,
                                        268.32,
                                        184.9
                                    ],
                                    "text": "want to answer the query P(B = true)."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        172.31,
                                        196.31,
                                        237.42,
                                        206.28
                                    ],
                                    "text": "P(B = true) ="
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        253.45,
                                        192.26,
                                        267.84,
                                        202.22
                                    ],
                                    "text": "X"
                                },
                                {

                                        281.1,
                                        219.98
                                    ],
                                    "text": "a∈range(A)"
                                },

                                        202.22
                                    ],

                                        206.28

                                        294.26
