                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        305.18,
                                        388.9,
                                        350.76,
                                        399.61
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ϕ1(a, true)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        350.77,
                                        376.17,
                                        362.63,
                                        387.24
                                    ],
                                    "text": "!2"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        493.05,
                                        388.73,
                                        504.67,
                                        398.7
                                    ],
                                    "text": "(9)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        232.65,
                                        427.46,
                                        245.62,
                                        437.42
                                    ],
                                    "text": "= "
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        245.62,
                                        420.72,
                                        250.61,
                                        430.69
                                    ],
                                    "text": "1"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        244.36,
                                        434.3,
                                        251.15,
                                        444.26
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Z"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        275.6,
                                        423.41,
                                        289.98,
                                        433.37
                                    ],
                                    "text": "X"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        262.62,
                                        442.07,
                                        302.97,
                                        451.13
                                    ],
                                    "text": "c∈range(C)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        304.63,
                                        427.46,
                                        349.26,
                                        438.17
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ϕ2(c, true)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        349.26,
                                        414.73,
                                        361.12,
                                        425.8
                                    ],
                                    "text": "!2"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        488.07,
                                        427.29,
                                        504.67,
                                        437.26
                                    ],
                                    "text": "(10)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        232.65,
                                        460.05,
                                        245.62,
                                        470.01
                                    ],
                                    "text": "= "
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        245.62,
                                        453.31,
                                        250.61,
                                        463.27
                                    ],
                                    "text": "1"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        244.36,
                                        466.88,
                                        251.15,
                                        476.84
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Z"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        253.07,
                                        454.4,
                                        259.02,
                                        464.36
                                    ],
                                    "text":""
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        259.02,
                                        460.05,
                                        292.67,
                                        471.5
                                    ],
                                    "text": "φ1 + φ3"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        293.17,
                                        453.29,
                                        303.09,
                                        464.36
                                    ],
                                    "text":"2"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        303.59,
                                        460.05,
                                        306.35,
                                        470.01
                                    ],
                                    "text": "."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        488.07,
                                        459.88,
                                        504.67,
                                        469.84
                                    ],
                                    "text": "(11)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.44,
                                        481.74,
                                        505.65,
                                        491.81
                                    ],
                                    "text": "This example illustrates the idea of using a representative of indistinguishable objects for compu-"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        492.65,
                                        504.0,
                                        502.93
                                    ],
                                    "text": "tations (here, either A or C can be chosen as a representative for the group consisting of A and"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        503.64,
                                        504.0,
                                        513.84
                                    ],
                                    "text": "C). This idea can be generalised to groups of k indistinguishable objects to significantly reduce the"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        514.55,
                                        291.3,
                                        524.51
                                    ],
                                    "text": "computational effort when answering queries."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        545.27,
                                        115.97,
                                        557.23
                                    ],
                                    "text": "B"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        127.93,
                                        545.27,
                                        449.84,
                                        557.23
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Formal Description of the Advanced Colour Passing Algorithm"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.69,
                                        565.06,
                                        505.24,
                                        575.03
                                    ],
                                    "text": "The ACP algorithm (Luttermann et al., 2024c) extends the colour passing algorithm (Kersting et al.,"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        576.05,
                                        504.0,
                                        585.91
                                    ],
                                    "text": "2009; Ahmadi et al., 2013), thereby solving the problem of constructing a lifted representation in form"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        586.88,
                                        504.0,
                                        596.84
                                    ],
                                    "text": "of a PFG from a given FG. The idea of ACP is to first find symmetric subgraphs in a propositional FG"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        597.79,
                                        504.0,
                                        607.75
                                    ],
                                    "text": "and then group together these symmetric subgraphs. ACP searches for symmetries based on potentials"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        608.62,
                                        504.0,
                                        618.69
                                    ],
                                    "text": "of factors, on ranges and evidence of randvars, as well as on the graph structure by employing a"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        619.53,
                                        504.0,
                                        629.59
                                    ],
                                    "text": "colour passing routine. A formal description of the ACP algorithm is depicted in Alg. 2. We next"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        630.52,
                                        315.16,
                                        640.48
                                    ],
                                    "text": "explain the steps undertaken by ACP in more detail."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.64,
                                        646.91,
                                        504.0,
                                        656.87
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ACP begins with the colour assignment to variable nodes, meaning that all randvars having the same"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        657.74,
                                        504.0,
                                        667.8
                                    ],
                                    "text": "range and observed event are assigned the same colour. randvar with different ranges or different"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        668.68,
                                        505.74,
                                        678.7
                                    ],
                                    "text": "observed events are assigned distinct colours since those randvar do not “behave in the same way”."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.69,
                                        679.56,
                                        504.0,
                                        689.62
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Then, in Line 2, ACP assigns colours to factor nodes such that exchangeable factors encoding"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        690.47,
                                        504.0,
                                        700.53
                                    ],
                                    "text": "equivalent semantics according to Def. 2 are assigned the same colour. In its original form, ACP"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        701.38,
                                        504.0,
                                        711.44
                                    ],
                                    "text": "uses the DEFT algorithm (Luttermann et al., 2024d) to efficiently detect exchangeable factors and"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        712.28,
                                        504.0,
                                        722.35
                                    ],
                                    "text": "to assign colours accordingly. The DEFT algorithm deployed within ACP, however, is not able to"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        301.18,
                                        743.01,
                                        310.15,
                                        751.98
                                    ],
                                    "text": "12"
                                }
                            ],
                            "section": [],
                            "sub_section": [],
                            "type": "text",
                            "width": 612.0
                        }
                    },
                    {
                        "content": "",
                        "metadata": {
                            "chapter": [],
                            "height": 792.0,
                            "page": 12,
                            "rects": [
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        216.34,
                                        42.21,
                                        395.66,
                                        51.18
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Lifted Model Construction without Normalisation"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.64,
                                        74.01,
                                        432.08,
                                        84.27
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Algorithm 2 Advanced Colour Passing (reprinted from Luttermann et al., 2024c)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        125.43,
                                        88.03,
                                        500.81,
                                        101.18
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Input: An FG G with randvars R = {R1, . . . , Rn}, factors Φ = {ϕ1, . . . , ϕm}, and evidence"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        125.43,
                                        98.94,
                                        251.35,
                                        112.09
                                    ],
                                    "text": "E = {R1 = r1, . . . , Rk = rk}."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        125.43,
                                        106.23,
                                        482.41,
                                        120.1
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Output: A lifted representation G′ in form of a PFG entailing equivalent semantics as G."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        122.75,
                                        330.6,
                                        135.9
                                    ],
                                    "text": "1: Assign each Ri a colour according to R(Ri) and E"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        133.58,
                                        504.0,
                                        145.14
                                    ],
                                    "text": "2: Assign each ϕi a colour according to order-independent potentials and rearrange arguments"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        124.94,
                                        144.56,
                                        171.97,
                                        154.53
                                    ],
                                    "text": "accordingly"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        155.76,
                                        151.86,
                                        165.72
                                    ],
                                    "text": "3: repeat"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        167.15,
                                        119.95,
                                        176.11
                                    ],
                                    "text": "4:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        139.88,
                                        166.38,
                                        240.61,
                                        179.53
                                    ],
                                    "text": "for each factor ϕ ∈Φ do"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        178.06,
                                        119.95,
                                        187.02
                                    ],
                                    "text": "5:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        154.82,
                                        177.46,
                                        225.97,
                                        191.94
                                    ],
                                    "text": "signatureϕ ←[ ]"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        188.96,
                                        119.95,
                                        197.93
                                    ],
                                    "text": "6:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        154.82,
                                        188.2,
                                        331.12,
                                        201.35
                                    ],
                                    "text": "for each randvar R ∈neighbours(G, ϕ) do"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        385.2,
                                        188.2,
                                        501.22,
                                        198.33
                                    ],
                                    "text": "▷In order of appearance in ϕ"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        199.87,
                                        119.95,
                                        208.84
                                    ],
                                    "text": "7:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        169.77,
                                        199.28,
                                        299.51,
                                        209.99
                                    ],
                                    "text": "append(signatureϕ, R.colour)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        213.63,
                                        119.95,
                                        222.6
                                    ],
                                    "text": "8:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        154.82,
                                        213.04,
                                        282.86,
                                        223.75
                                    ],
                                    "text": "append(signatureϕ, ϕ.colour)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        112.98,
                                        227.39,
                                        119.95,
                                        236.36
                                    ],
                                    "text": "9:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        139.88,
                                        226.63,
                                        322.07,
                                        236.76
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Group together all ϕs with the same signature"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        238.3,
                                        119.96,
                                        247.27
                                    ],
                                    "text": "10:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        139.88,
                                        237.54,
                                        302.57,
                                        247.5
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Assign each such cluster a unique colour"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        249.21,
                                        119.96,
                                        258.18
                                    ],
                                    "text": "11:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        139.88,
                                        248.45,
                                        297.52,
                                        258.58
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Set ϕ.colour correspondingly for all ϕs"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        260.12,
                                        119.96,
                                        269.09
                                    ],
                                    "text": "12:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        139.88,
                                        259.36,
                                        249.82,
                                        272.51
                                    ],
                                    "text": "for each randvar R ∈R do"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        271.03,
                                        119.96,
                                        280.0
                                    ],
                                    "text": "13:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        154.82,
                                        270.43,
                                        227.22,
                                        284.91
                                    ],
                                    "text": "signatureR ←[ ]"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        281.94,
                                        119.96,
                                        290.9
                                    ],
                                    "text": "14:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        154.82,
                                        281.17,
                                        324.08,
                                        294.33
                                    ],
                                    "text": "for each factor ϕ ∈neighbours(G, R) do"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        292.85,
                                        119.96,
                                        301.81
                                    ],
                                    "text": "15:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        169.77,
                                        292.08,
                                        347.44,
                                        305.24
                                    ],
                                    "text": "if ϕ is commutative w.r.t. S and R ∈S then"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        303.76,
                                        119.96,
                                        312.72
                                    ],
                                    "text": "16:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        184.71,
                                        303.16,
                                        330.6,
                                        313.87
                                    ],
                                    "text": "append(signatureR, (ϕ.colour, 0))"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        314.67,
                                        119.96,
                                        323.63
                                    ],
                                    "text": "17:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        169.77,
                                        314.19,
                                        185.26,
                                        324.15
                                    ],
                                    "text": "else"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        325.57,
                                        119.96,
                                        334.54
                                    ],
                                    "text": "18:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        184.71,
                                        324.98,
                                        356.39,
                                        335.69
                                    ],
                                    "text": "append(signatureR, (ϕ.colour, p(R, ϕ)))"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        338.97,
                                        119.96,
                                        347.94
                                    ],
                                    "text": "19:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        154.82,
                                        338.21,
                                        303.59,
                                        349.67
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Sort signatureR according to colour"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        349.88,
                                        119.96,
                                        358.85
                                    ],
                                    "text": "20:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        154.82,
                                        349.29,
                                        285.81,
                                        360.0
                                    ],
                                    "text": "append(signatureR, R.colour)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        363.28,
                                        119.96,
                                        372.25
                                    ],
                                    "text": "21:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        139.88,
                                        362.52,
                                        323.78,
                                        372.65
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Group together all Rs with the same signature"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        374.19,
                                        119.96,
                                        383.16
                                    ],
                                    "text": "22:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        139.88,
                                        373.43,
                                        302.57,
                                        383.39
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Assign each such cluster a unique colour"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        385.1,
                                        119.96,
                                        394.07
                                    ],
                                    "text": "23:"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        139.88,
                                        384.34,
                                        300.93,
                                        394.47
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Set R.colour correspondingly for all Rs"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        395.25,
                                        250.02,
                                        405.5
                                    ],
                                    "text": "24: until grouping does not change"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.5,
                                        405.73,
                                        272.27,
                                        419.31
                                    ],
                                    "text": "25: G′ ←construct PFG from groupings"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        442.66,
                                        504.0,
                                        452.72
                                    ],
                                    "text": "handle factors with differently scaled potentials (i.e., it detects exchangeable factors according to"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        453.57,
                                        504.0,
                                        463.77
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Def. 2 only for α = 1) and thus, our extension replaces the DEFT algorithm by Alg. 1 to detect"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        464.55,
                                        442.53,
                                        474.51
                                    ],
                                    "text": "exchangeable factors independent of the scale of their potentials in Line 2 of Alg. 2."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.64,
                                        480.94,
                                        504.0,
                                        490.9
                                    ],
                                    "text": "After the initial colour assignments, ACP runs a colour passing routine. ACP first passes the colours"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        491.77,
                                        504.0,
                                        501.83
                                    ],
                                    "text": "from each variable node to its neighbouring factor nodes and after a recolouring step to reduce"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        502.8,
                                        504.0,
                                        512.89
                                    ],
                                    "text": "communication overhead, each factor node ϕ sends its colour as well as the position p(R, ϕ) of R in"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        513.59,
                                        505.74,
                                        523.8
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ϕ’s argument list to all of its neighbouring variable nodes R, again followed by a recolouring step."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.69,
                                        524.5,
                                        504.0,
                                        534.56
                                    ],
                                    "text": "The procedure is then iterated until the identified groups do not change anymore. In the end, the"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        535.48,
                                        505.74,
                                        545.61
                                    ],
                                    "text": "determined groups are then used to construct a PFG entailing equivalent semantics as the input FG G."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        551.8,
                                        504.0,
                                        561.86
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Figure 6 illustrates ACP on an example input FG. In this example, all randvars are Boolean and"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        562.78,
                                        505.25,
                                        575.93
                                    ],
                                    "text": "there is no evidence available (i.e., E = ∅). Initially, ACP assigns all randvars the same colour (e.g.,"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.74,
                                        573.76,
                                        503.7,
                                        585.13
                                    ],
                                    "text": "yellow) because they have the same range (Boolean) and evidence (no evidence at all). As ϕ1 and ϕ2"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        584.6,
                                        504.17,
                                        594.56
                                    ],
                                    "text": "encode equivalent semantics (they represent identical potentials), they are assigned the same colour"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.67,
                                        595.48,
                                        504.0,
                                        605.64
                                    ],
                                    "text": "(e.g., blue). The colours are then passed from variable nodes to factor nodes and as each factor has"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        606.34,
                                        505.24,
                                        616.4
                                    ],
                                    "text": "two neighbouring randvars, all factors receive the same messages. After recolouring the factors,"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        617.25,
                                        504.0,
                                        627.31
                                    ],
                                    "text": "their colour assignments remain identical to their initial assignments as they all received the same"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        628.24,
                                        505.25,
                                        638.2
                                    ],
                                    "text": "message. The purpose of the recolouring is mainly to reduce communication overhead. Afterwards,"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        639.18,
                                        504.17,
                                        649.1
                                    ],
                                    "text": "the factor nodes send their colours to their neighbouring variable nodes. Each message from a factor"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        648.73,
                                        504.0,
                                        660.03
                                    ],
                                    "text": "to a randvar contains the position of the randvar in the factor if the factor is not commutative3, else"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        661.01,
                                        504.0,
                                        670.91
                                    ],
                                    "text": "the position is replaced by zero. For simplicity, there is no commutative factor in the example shown"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        671.88,
                                        504.0,
                                        683.33
                                    ],
                                    "text": "in Fig. 6. Thus, A receives a message (blue, 1) from ϕ1, B receives a message (blue, 2) from ϕ1 as"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.64,
                                        682.78,
                                        504.0,
                                        693.66
                                    ],
                                    "text": "well as a message (blue, 2) from ϕ2, and C receives a message (blue, 1) from ϕ2. Consequently, A"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        120.65,
                                        701.64,
                                        504.0,
                                        712.13
                                    ],
                                    "text": "3A commutative factor is a factor which maps its arguments to the same potential value independent of the"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        713.12,
                                        350.32,
                                        722.09
                                    ],
                                    "text": "order of a (sub)set of its assigned values (Luttermann et al., 2024e)."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        301.18,
                                        743.01,
                                        310.15,
                                        751.98
                                    ],
                                    "text": "13"
                                }
                            ],

                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        260.26,
                                        504.0,
                                        270.62
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Figure 6: A visualisation of the steps undertaken by Alg. 2 on an input FG with only Boolean"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        271.25,
                                        504.0,
                                        281.21
                                    ],
                                    "text": "randvars and no evidence (left). Colours are first passed from variable nodes to factor nodes, followed"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        282.08,
                                        504.0,
                                        292.14
                                    ],
                                    "text": "by a recolouring, and then passed back from factor nodes to variable nodes, again followed by a"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        292.99,
                                        504.0,
                                        303.05
                                    ],
                                    "text": "recolouring. The colour passing procedure is iterated until convergence and the resulting PFG is"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        303.98,
                                        417.95,
                                        313.94
                                    ],
                                    "text": "depicted on the right. This figure is reprinted from (Luttermann et al., 2024c)."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        339.46,
                                        504.0,
                                        349.51
                                    ],
                                    "text": "and C receive identical messages (positions are not shown in Fig. 6) and after the recolouring step, A"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        350.31,
                                        504.0,
                                        360.42
                                    ],
                                    "text": "and C share the same colour while B is assigned a different colour. The groupings do not change in"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        361.2,
                                        477.98,
                                        374.35
                                    ],
                                    "text": "further iterations and the resulting PFG is shown on the right (where X has domain {A, C})."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        377.55,
                                        504.0,
                                        387.57
                                    ],
                                    "text": "For more details about the colour passing routine and the grouping of nodes, we refer the reader to"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.67,
                                        388.42,
                                        504.0,
                                        398.49
                                    ],
                                    "text": "(Luttermann et al., 2024c). The authors also demonstrate the benefits of a lifted representation in"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        399.41,
                                        284.52,
                                        409.37
                                    ],
                                    "text": "terms of speedup for probabilistic inference."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        429.24,
                                        116.63,
                                        441.19
                                    ],
                                    "text": "C"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        128.59,
                                        429.24,
                                        204.42,
                                        441.19
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Missing Proofs"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.67,
                                        448.47,
                                        505.65,
                                        460.47
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Theorem 2. Let ϕ1(R1, . . . , Rn) and ϕ2(R′1, . . . , R′n) denote two factors. If ϕ1 and ϕ2 are ex-"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        459.46,
                                        301.47,
                                        470.4
                                    ],
                                    "text": "changeable, then it holds that Dcos(ϕ1, ϕ2) = 0."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        479.26,
                                        504.0,
                                        495.95
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Proof. If ϕ1 and ϕ2 are exchangeable, there exists a scalar α ∈R+ and a permutation π of {1, . . . , n}"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        492.5,
                                        505.74,
                                        508.35
                                    ],
                                    "text": "such that for all r1, . . . , rn ∈×ni=1range(Ri) it holds that ϕ1(r1, . . . , rn) = α·ϕ2(rπ(1), . . . , rπ(n))."
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        107.53,
                                        504.54,
                                        504.0,
                                        516.09
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Without loss of generality, assume that the arguments of ϕ2 are rearranged such that for all"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        515.69,
                                        160.18,
                                        530.17
                                    ],
                                    "text": "r1, . . . , rn ∈"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        164.71,
                                        518.71,
                                        172.45,
                                        528.67
                                    ],
                                    "text": "×"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        172.45,
                                        514.32,
                                        177.38,
                                        521.29
                                    ],
                                    "text": "n"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        172.45,
                                        515.45,
                                        504.0,
                                        528.67
                                    ],
                                    "text": "i=1range(Ri) it holds that ϕ1(r1, . . . , rn) = α · ϕ2(r1, . . . , rn). Then, entering"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        108.0,
                                        526.43,
                                        327.68,
                                        539.58
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ϕ1(r1, . . . , rn) = α · ϕ2(r1, . . . , rn) into Eq. (3) yields"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        143.36,
                                        560.78,
                                        223.99,
                                        573.76
                                    ],
                                    "text": "Dcos(ϕ1, ϕ2) = 1 −"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        289.83,
                                        544.24,
                                        301.22,
                                        557.23
                                    ],
                                    "text": "α ·"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        329.52,
                                        542.18,
                                        340.03,
                                        552.14
                                    ],
                                    "text": "P"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        303.44,
                                        554.96,
                                        366.12,
                                        564.92
                                    ],
                                    "text": "a∈×ni=1range(Ri)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        367.78,
                                        542.87,
                                        396.21,
                                        554.95
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ϕ2(a)2"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        227.4,
                                        565.89,
                                        253.22,
                                        582.88
                                    ],
                                    "text": "rα2 ·"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        281.52,
                                        567.83,
                                        292.03,
                                        577.8
                                    ],
                                    "text": "P"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        255.44,
                                        580.61,

                                {

                                    ],

                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        371.93,
                                        594.71,
                                        400.36,
                                        606.8
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ϕ2(a)2"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        227.4,
                                        616.04,
                                        235.7,
                                        626.01
                                    ],
                                    "text": "√"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        235.71,
                                        617.73,
                                        263.74,
                                        634.72
                                    ],
                                    "text": "α2 ·r"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        289.83,
                                        619.68,
                                        300.34,
                                        629.64
                                    ],
                                    "text": "P"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        263.74,
                                        632.45,
                                        326.42,
                                        642.42
                                    ],
                                    "text": "a∈×ni=1range(Ri)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        328.09,
                                        617.73,
                                        374.17,
                                        634.72
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ϕ2(a)2 ·r"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        400.25,
                                        619.68,
                                        410.76,
                                        629.64
                                    ],
                                    "text": "P"
                                },
                                {

                                        374.17,

                                        642.42
                                    ],

                                },
                                {

                                    ],

                                },
                                {

                                        622.42

                                },
                                {

                                    ],

                                },
                                {

                                        227.4,
                                        647.93,
                                        238.79,
                                        660.91
                                    ],

                                },
                                {

                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        227.4,
                                        671.3,
                                        238.79,
                                        684.28
                                    ],
                                    "text": "α ·"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        267.09,
                                        669.24,
                                        277.6,
                                        679.2
                                    ],
                                    "text": "P"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        241.01,
                                        682.02,
                                        303.69,
                                        691.98
                                    ],
                                    "text": "a∈×ni=1range(Ri)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        305.35,
                                        670.66,
                                        333.78,
                                        682.01
                                    ],
                                    "text": "ϕ2(a)2"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [
                                        488.07,

                                        674.26
                                    ],
                                    "text": "(14)"
                                },
                                {
                                    "bbox": [

                                    ],

                                },

                                    ],
                                    "text": "(15)"
                                },
                                {

                                    ],
